solution.text:
Let the length of court be x m
and, the breadth of court be y m.
Therefore, perimeter of the rectangular court:
i.e., Perimeter = 2x + 2y
i.e., _{{2*k}}_ = 2x + 2y
i.e., _{k}_ = x + y
i.e., y = _{k}_ - x
Now, Area = \(x\times y\)
.i.e., _{l}_ = \(x\times (_{k}_ - x)\)
.i.e., _{l}_ = \(_{k}_x - x^2\)
.i.e., \(x^2 -_{k}_x + _{l}_ = 0\)
Now, comparing with general equation
i.e., a = 1 , b = -_{k}_ and c = _{l}_
Discriminant = \(b^2 -4ac = (-_{k}_)^2 - 4\times 1\times _{l}_\)
i.e., = _{{k*k}}_ - _{{4*l}}_
i.e., = _{{(k*k)-(4*l)}}_
Since discriminant is negative it is not possible to design such basketball court

content.text: Is it possible to design a rectangular basketball court of perimeter _{{2*k}}_ m and area _{l}_ \(m^2\)? If yes, find its length.
